description:
After obtaining the dragon`s magicite, Anisphia and Euphyllia visit Tilty, Anisphia`s friend and research partner, in hopes of developing new technology with it. Anisphia is giddy with excitement, but then she receives word of the continuing investigation into the annulment of Euphyllia`s engagement...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: En quête de la vérité sur les fiançailles rompues et l`homme charmé
Getting to the Truth of the Annulment and the Fascination
Hadan to Miryou no Shinsou Kyuumei
破談と魅了の真相究明
